name: A censer of shadows
data: It increases the users wisdom somewhat.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The censer is meant to be spun, permeating the air with the fragrant
fumes of shadow. The intoxicating vapor seems to alter your perception.
